text: Sukanya Srisurat (; ; born 3 May 1995) is a Thai female weightlifter competing in the 58 kg category and representing Thailand at international competitions. She competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. She was sanctioned for using the doping Methandienone.Sanctioned athletes. ==Major results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40 | Year ! rowspan=2 width=250 | Venue !
